QuestData.Title: Dredger Duty
QuestData.Description:
You fixed up the muck pool so we can make some dredgers, but them devourers are gonna keep causin' trouble.
We're gonna need a Gem of Binding so we can dredge up a biggun to protect the pool.
I'll show you how to dredge up some disposable dredgers to work with for now.
Get 'em digging in the rubble to find us a Gem of Binding, and then we'll reshape 'em all into a biggun to kick them devourers outta here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Dredge a dredger and bring it to the pile of rubble. Wait for it to dig through the pile and collect the Gem of Binding.
QuestData.RewardText: Got a bit of devourer gunk on it, but it will have to do.

Objectives.Objective: Dredger thrown at the rubble pile
